name: Wild Road Fighter
description:
Controls:

WASD or Arrows

Wild Road Fighter is a game made in a week for the #GodotWildJam.

Bullet-hell game, where you control a car and must survive to waves of enemies. In every wave you can assemble weapons or upgrade those already you have. Defeat the final boss and take your decision.

All the assets I used are free and you can contact their creators:

Sprites by: @MattWalkden

Music by: @DOS88

Fonts by: @Daniellinssen

The cover art was made it with an AI
